name: test_e2e_with_logs[303_CMD_BASH_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASH_003` |
| **Name** | Shell shadow file access |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | bash_specific |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `| /bin/sh -c 'cat /etc/shadow'`
- **Encoded**: `%7C%20%2Fbin%2Fsh%20-c%20%27cat%20%2Fetc%2Fshadow%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~41000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:32.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=CMD_BASH_003-1771076672409-8hn98b pattern_id=CMD_BASH_003 uri=/?q=%7C%20%2Fbin%2Fsh%20-c%20%27cat%20%2Fetc%2Fshadow%27 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
